Get draft conservation network sites

Source: R/data_draft_areas.R
data_draft_areas.Rd

This function pulls information (length, area, shape, etc.) about draft conservation network sites for the Scotian Shelf-Bay of Fundy Bioregion. More information is available at: https://open.canada.ca/data/en/dataset/bb048082-bc05-4588-b4f0-492b1f1b8737

Usage

data_draft_areas(bioregion = "Scotian Shelf")

Arguments

bioregion

name of the bio region to match from the NAME_E column from Open Data. Default is "Scotian Shelf"

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
draftareas <- data_draft_areas()
} # }
